83. Timetable II

13 Dec 2020

8:18 Fes 9:20 Imouzzer Kandar for breakfast 10:40 Lac Aoua 11:00 Ifran overlook 11:40 Pitstop in Atlas cedar forest for wild monkeys 1:00 Midelt region by car 1:45 Zaida for lunch 3:30 Atlas range 6:30 Erfoud 7:00 Car transfer to 4x4 for desert oasis settlement 7:30 Switch to camelback into the Sahara 10:30 Arrive at Berber camp 11:00 Tajin dinner 12:00 Drum circle 1:30 Night hike 3:00 Sleep 6:45 Wake for sunrise 7:00 Day in, day out, beneath the blazing sun
